title: Salt pork belly with split pea purée and sauerkraut
description: This quick cook sauerkraut is a short cut to the real thing, and any leftovers can be stored in an airtight jar in the fridge for up to two weeks.
ingredients: 1 medium white cabbage (about 750g/1lb 10oz), very thinly shredded
600g/1lb 5oz unsmoked streaky bacon, in one piece, rind removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
